name: John
text: Hey I have something to talk about the things we discussed yesterday, call me when you are free

name: Clara
text: Let's go shopping, call me when you are ready

name: Harry
text: Ron told me you lost my wand, Hermonie. You have to buy a new one for me, the most expensive one

name: Hermonie
text: Don't believe everything that blonde says. He always talk about nonsense things. I already have sent your wand with my owl. It is on the way. Should be right there in any minute

name: Ron
text: Haha, Harry . Gotcha. Your face was so funny when I told you your wand was lost

name: Dumbledore
text: Kids you all will be kicked out of school if you keep sneaking out when everyone is sleeping. Don't ruin peoples' peaceful dreams.

name: Voldemort
text: Kids, you all are welcomed to my property if Dumbledore kicked you out. I need more people to cheer me up before I do my nose surgery. P.S : Don't forget to bring all the gold coins you have. I need those to pay the doctor
